archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1135
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be reminded when I have forgotten to complete a journey in the eShop

properties.value: [CCM] CCM can send the campaign based on provided information to be confirmed with BSS. Partially supported. External event needs to be send to CCM from the module that detects abandoned basket [BSS] such notification can be OOTB send from BSS, assuming its just about prompting customer for basket completion after some period of time (not considered here proposing here e.g. additional discount) BSS notification assumed for HLD

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
